website_summaries.verdict: A top-selling pair of Ugg slippers, as they are comfortable and stylish enough to wear in public.
pros: Versatile, as this slipper provides a lightweight yet structured fit that's ideal for wearing around the house, outside, or even for trips around town
Has a fit that's cozy and feels just right — not too warm
cons: May require a bit of a break-in period, as they feel tight at first but tend to stretch a bit with wear
On the higher end of the price scale

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic
customer_reviews.text: The front is very soft and caves in. I went to an ugg store and the same slippers dont do that. Not authentic uggs. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No quality control.
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I would leave a negative for UGGS. I have worn them for years and years. They have always been durable and long lived. The material on the left shoe split open at the toe next to the seam. Not on the seam. Deeply disappointed and will not buy them again. Lack of Quality Control is typical of all these products now being made in Viet Nam.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Petersen

customer_reviews.title: im keeping the 12s and just electing to double up on socks as I do love the shoe
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give a 5 star rating because the shoe itself screams quality. I’m a 10 1/2 normally and received a size 11 as a Xmas gift. Unfortunately they were way to tight for my liking, so I exchanged them for a size 12. Now, they’re unfortunately too big! However, im keeping the 12s and just electing to double up on socks as I do love the shoe. If you’re a 1/2 size I feel like they’re going to be either to tight or to large no matter what you do, if you’re an even number shoe size just go 1 size up and it should fit perfectly for you.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Nicholas Howe

customer_reviews.title: Order Your Shoe Size!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of UGG slippers, and I have to say, wearing them barefoot, they are TOASTY!! I couldn't be happier with that. The only downside, and I guess it's the way they are designed with not much heel, is they kinda slip in the back when you walk. Kind of a minor detail, as I'm not walking around the neighborhood in them, only around the house, BUT...I wish they didn't do that. All reviewers say that you have to break them in initially, and I agree with that. UGG makes a quality product, and as far as keeping your feet warm, during a Michigan winter, they do that perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: 4-Stringer

customer_reviews.title: Best slippers ever
customer_reviews.text: My husband ( whom is known for wearing through his clothes and shoes really fast) got a pair for these slippers for a gift 10 years ago. These babies are so well made, he still wears them! I only just purchased him another pair as a Valentines day gift because his old ones look so worn now (though he claims they are still comfy and wears them all the time). The new ones are so soft, I can't wait to give them to him. He usually wears a size 12, but the 13 fits him perfect. I won't have to worry about buying him his next pair for another 10 years!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: ... gift and after 1 week of wearing they’re breaking super unfair for the price of the shoe and I’ve ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift and after 1 week of wearing they’re breaking super unfair for the price of the shoe and I’ve been taking super good care of them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price, hard slippers.
customer_reviews.text: They are really firm, the soles are solid and concrete. I was expecting a bit of cushion to them. While the wool is cozy the firmness of the soles make you feel like Frankenstein. Just no where near as comfy as I was hoping. Especially for over 100 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made Worth The Extra Money for the Quality build and materials
customer_reviews.text: Had a pair of these for over five years wore them a lot and they finally wore out soles fell off. I wear a size 11D shoe and these run a little small. I ordered an 11 and a 12. Returned the 11 so I would order one size up, the 12 fits perfectly the 11 is too small. The quality of the leather and construction appears to be excellent. I think these are worth the extra money if they last like my old ones.
customer_reviews.author: rcboals

customer_reviews.title: Ugg Lights
customer_reviews.text: These are a very nice design, but I have had three pair of Uggs and this has the least amount of fur in the shoe, so though it is comfortable, it has less of an Ugg feel than the others. I suspect that they will only feel good for about 1/2 as long. Very durable design and look great in anything you may want to wear.
customer_reviews.author: TMAN

customer_reviews.title: Some major drawbacks.
customer_reviews.text: These are odd. The opening for the foot is very small, which makes it difficult to get on. So don't expect them to "slip" on; they're a struggle Also they run very small, at least the pair I got. I usually wear 11-11 1//2 so ordered the 12.My toes ram into the tip of the slipper. Not very comfortable really. Of course they are UGGs so they are made very well. But can't say I'm happy with them tho.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara-Garnett Wilson

customer_reviews.title: The most awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: It's been so long since I've owned a pair of UGGs, I had forgotten how awesome they are! These are gorgeous. So beautifully made! I ordered my size and they fit like a glove. I have practically been wearing then 24/7 since they arrived!! My feet are warm as toast and sooo comfy. I loved them so much I turned around and bought 2 more pairs! My feet will be in heavenly clouds for many years to come!
customer_reviews.author: MarlouTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Well Made, But An Impractical Design!
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made and packaged; but the design is lost somewhere between being a slipper, and a shoe. If I could have easily slipped my feet into them then I would have kept the pair I received; but, while loaded with quality, they just weren't practical for use as a bedroom slipper.
customer_reviews.author: John Grayman

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY Durable and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My last pair lasted me 8 years. These Ugg Slippers are very well made. I have extremely flat feet, and they are SO comfortable as they have no arch support. The 1 inch sole lasts forever. They look cool and I get a lot of compliments on them. I originally bought the navy blue, but then went back and bought the chocolate too! I HIGHLY recommend these slippers when you don't want to wear cheap slippers, but also don't want to wear sneakers in the house when just relaxing. Word of advice: Get the Scotchguard Nubuck and Suede Spray. The slippers are already water resistant, but the spray keeps them from getting scuffed or spot stained.
customer_reviews.author: VIPER G

customer_reviews.title: Unraveling??
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son for Christmas...only one in the house who doesn’t have a pair of Tasmans. This pair started unraveling, the embroidered stitching detail around the foot opening literally came undone within a week of wear. Now the sole is detaching from the shoe. Have been wearing tasmans for YEARS and this hasn’t ever happened to any other pair. Wishing I bought directly from Ugg so I could discuss with their customer service. I really hope these weren’t counterfeit. Uggs simply don’t fall apart like this. I would return except they’ve been worn for at least 3 weeks and I got rid of the box. Gave 2 stars because my son really loved them :( Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Read reviews on sizing.
customer_reviews.text: They are definitely well made and soft. I’m SO glad I read the reviews!! I wear a size 8-81/2 in women’s, where a men’s 7 or 7.5 is perfect. I ordered a 8 in men’s and they are still kinda too snug. I think they will break in nicely in a few days. Definitely go up a size. UPATE! After wearing them for a few days they broke in wonderfully! I’m in love with them and looking for a second in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: You Can't Beat These Slippers !!!
customer_reviews.text: These UGG slippers are the absolute best !!! My last pair lasted 10 years & finally got stained when I spilled something on them SO don't do that ! They run a bit small so order a size larger than usual . The suede is impeccable , the lining cozy , the stitching stylish ; they just make you happy & keep your feet warm at the same time :-) Worth the price for sure !!! - Lifetime UGG lover
customer_reviews.author: HARDIE

customer_reviews.title: Closer to an indoor shoe than a slipper.
customer_reviews.text: I have harwood floors thoughtout my home. My bare feet will start to hurt at times. I wanted something with support and comfort. These Uggs achieve that. They are heavy and aren’t a plush feel... however the lamb wool is comfortable, warm during the winter. It’s really a great indoor shoe. Buy one size larger than your normal size. I am a 9.5 and bought a 10.
customer_reviews.author: Kory. V

customer_reviews.title: great for cool weather house shoes so he can duck ...
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my 80 year old father. he is an old fashioned gentlemen, and I wasn't convinced he would wear these clogs. he put them on and LOVES them. great for cool weather house shoes so he can duck into the garage/workshop, out to the porch for firewood etc. just the right amount of support for casual indoor wear and handsome.
customer_reviews.author: keepitsimple

customer_reviews.title: Not too small, not too warm.....just right!
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of slippers. Been wearing them for a few weeks now, they take a week or so to break in - they will feel too tight at first but will stretch to fit your feet. The lining is nice and warm without making your feet sweat, the soles are great for the occasional trip to the woodpile, and they're all around very comfortable. The only gripe I have is that they're a little low on the heel so your foot lifts out a little when you walk, but that's more the consequence of buying slippers with low ankle coverage than an actual design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Agraffe Machicolate

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: First pair of UGGs. Nice quality and design. I wear size 10 in shoes so I ordered size 11 and it worked out well. Wool feels good but nothing amazing. It not like they are super padded or anything and it compresses as you wear it. I have worn with and without socks. I prefer with socks and they fit better. Waiting for the cold weather to really see how they work but they feel pretty toasty so far.
customer_reviews.author: R. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful slippers
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these UGG slippers. The first pair lasted years. Liked them so much, that when they had finally shown their age with wear, I didn't hesitate buy a second pair. They fit true to size, slip on relatively easily - there is a short rise in back to get over your heel - and I find them very comfortable. This pair appears to be as well made as the first pair I had, so they should last equally as long.
customer_reviews.author: pksimons

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well-made
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful slippers. I bought them for my husband, and he loves them. Ugg is a quality brand, and we're impressed with their durability, style, and comfort (yeah, I've commandeered them a couple times 😉). Ugg footwear seems to have gotten a slight bit smaller recently, so if you're in between sizes I'd recommend sizing up (whole sizes only). Lastly, to protect your investment use a protective spray on the outer suede, especially if you wear your slippers outside.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice slippers
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the box, put them on and they are really comfortable. I was wearing a pair of Kirkland slippers in the same/copycat design. I like the Kirkland pair because I can simply slip them on without using hands. This pair has a larger area in the back of the slipper to hold your foot in that requires you to use your hands. This pair also has a larger sole and I'm hoping more cushion. Time will tell how they last.
customer_reviews.author: JacksonJames

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 Size up to SLIP right into these Comfy Slippers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend as a Christmas gift! They are unique and high quality. He loves them! Pros: -Warm, soft and unique look! -High quality that I always see from Ugg Cons: A little snug for a slipper. If you want to actually slip into these, I would recommend a full size larger than your normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Jojo L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but flawed
customer_reviews.text: These are attractive shoes, but has issues. I have other Uggs. LIke 'em. However, the design is not good. All my other Uggs are true to size. These might be, but likely your big toe will crunch. So, order the next size? Not so fast. The backs of the shoe are so short that the heel of your foot slips out too easily. Would be worse with a larger size. So, I'd simply order a different styie of Ugg - still a quality shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Regular Person

customer_reviews.title: I should send them back
customer_reviews.text: I like my slippers to fit the back of my heel but these sit lower so they slip off a little too easy. These are warm they do fit well but they do slip off to easy. I like wearing my slippers like shoes and I don't like stepping on the back of my slippers. They don't go high enough to fully cover your heel. I should have sent these back but I'm too lazy. SOREL Men's Dude Moccasins fit better.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE MAC

customer_reviews.title: Crappy quality! Avoid this slipper!
customer_reviews.text: I gave these slippers two stars because all of the fur on the inside bottom wore off in the first 3 weeks, and it leaves the skin on the bottom of your foot rubbing against the sole rubber. It makes them very uncomfortable, not very warm, and can give you blisters on your foot. I emailed Uggs and they wouldn’t help me because I didn’t buy them from the uggs website, and the return period closed at Amazon, so I am stuck with a crappy pair of slippers. I really expected better from a company like Uggs, but this is the first and last product I will purchase from Uggs.
customer_reviews.author: g. man

customer_reviews.title: Size runs small
customer_reviews.text: Huge fan of Uggs. Embarrassed to say how long I had my previous pair but when I finally retired them I bought UGG Men's Tasman Slipper. I know they tend to be a little tight when new so I gave it 6 weeks but they are not stretching. Fleece also seems a lot coarser than my old boots. If I had to do over again I'd probably order 1/2 size larger if possible. They are a decent slipper but I don't love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers and fit wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything thing about these slippers. I received a pair for Christmas and loved them, but I lost them on a trip so I replaced them the very next day. They fit snug at first, but your foot will pack down the lining and will have them fitted for you perfectly in no time. I would recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars x2
customer_reviews.text: Now my husband has a pair of UGGs. I have the same slipper from a couple of years ago and he broke down and wanted a pair too. This has been great for me because he now understands my fascination with all my UGG boots/slippers. I know some people may not like how UGGs look (kind of hard to believe but I know) but you can't deny the comfort and quality from wearing a pair of UGGs.
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting a way better product
customer_reviews.text: Well I only had them for a week and I'm very surprised that the fur inside is already starting to come off I wear them without socks because if I wear them with socks it feels way too bunched up. and I'm surprised that a company like Ugg makes inferior products but then again maybe this is one that got by them. I hope they will extend the warranty because I do not think this is going to last three nights in the row when I took them off chunks of fur came out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Son's Favorite Slippers
customer_reviews.text: These slippers were a special request by my 40-something-year-old son as a Christmas gift. My sister had bought him a pair, as a Christmas gift, about 15 years ago and he finally wore them out. He was very specific in wanting another pair of Ugg Tasman Black Slippers! However, they may run a little small. His first pair was a size 12 (which is his shoe size) but these new ones were too tight. He neglected to tell me this until after the return window! So I ordered another pair (size 13) and sold the size 12 to his neighbor.
customer_reviews.author: Nana2Six

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars for the Heel
customer_reviews.text: I like these high quality UGG slippers and they look great. They are warm, soft and generally comfortable to wear. However, the heel is cut a bit low and wide and the slippers tend to slip in that area when walking. The soles are heavy and do not bend easily. Perhaps with some 'breaking in' the soles will ease up and improve those slipping heels. I do like these slippers, but that slipping heel cost them a star in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Steiner

customer_reviews.title: Nice but ran small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size up for my hubby since they don’t offer 1/2 sizes. Way too small. Can’t even get his foot inside at all. I’ve been wearing Uggs for over 20 years and know you need to wear them to stretch them out but he can’t even get his foot inside. He wears a 10.5 and I ordered 11. Going to return and order a12. I love mine and they fit perfectly in my normal 8 size.
customer_reviews.author: JAE

customer_reviews.title: A nice-looking solid shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like the solid Eva what I call crepe sole, not like other house shoes that have a grid pattern soul on the inside of the shoe. I ordered the Uggs to replace a pair of acorn Rambler because of the souls on the acorn shoes which has a grid pattern and they hurt my feet. They have a nice stylish look and very comfortable. I believe I will get many years of wear and comfort out of these Ugg shoes. If you're looking for a good solid shoe for the house these are the ones. They can be wore outside as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lester W

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable, Price In Mind, But Know This......
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start off but advising the most important information. Please go a half size up from normal shoe size, this is very comfortable considering the price which for me was steep for a slipper. But very luxurious feeling once I put my foot in them , also if you wear thick socks it may give a tighter fit at first so keep that in mind as well
customer_reviews.author: D. West

customer_reviews.title: comfy and REALLY well made.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I'm a stay at home retired disabled man. I wore the first pair out after 3 years of constant wear. I would actually wear them outside in the yard on a hard gravel driveway and they held up incredibly. Soft, warm, comfortable and built like a tank.
customer_reviews.author: mjcali

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it! Probably my last slippers purchase for a very long time. SERIOUSLY!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice slippers. Soft and very comfortable. Well designed and constructed. Was anticipating the soft fur inside would shed and wind up all over my toes and feet but not at all. Very thick soles and excellent padding. Won’t wear these down anytime soon. My last pair of slippers I haven’t had a year and you can see a hole appearing in the bottom. My only complaint is these run to exact size, so if you do want a little extra space which I think is typical of a house slipper, order a half size above what you typically wear.
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome House Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I would not call these "bedroom slippers", but rather "house shoes". Yes, the soles are firm and do not flex much, but I like that. They do run a bit small, so if you are in between sizes, go up rather than down. I just got mine and they are a bit snug. I am normally a 9.5 US and I ordered a 10 US. I'm sure they will loosen up over time. These are exactly what I've been looking for after years of spending money on cheap slippers. As always, you get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: Ray Fuller

customer_reviews.title: mens uggs
customer_reviews.text: I have been waring Uggs for 5 yrs not and this is my third pair. the only problem I have is the wool inside gets packed and hard eventually and my toes harden the pressure areas and leave softness to areas where there is less pressure and it results in a molded fit which eventually is uncomfortable. I wish I could buy extra liners or wool liners to replace older worn ones because buying new is expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Ya get what ya pay for! Best of the best, and WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: Well... YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR! Are these the cheapest slippers on Amazon? Nope. Are they more comfortable than expected? YUP! Is the quality the highest available? YUP! Are they not only comfy, but really durable? YUP! If you want the best and can afford a little bit more than a far inferior slipper, these are the ones for you! God bless and take care...
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hadjis

customer_reviews.title: Best Slippers Ever,!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had L.L.Bean slippers and loved them however the inside just wore out to fast so I decided to give these a try. Every review I could find online was positive and so far I have to agree. These are the most comfortable pair I think I've ever owned. As far as how long the interior lasts I have yet to find out though I have a good feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: last pair did well but wore the fur out of ...
customer_reviews.text: last pair did well but wore the fur out of them after 6+hard years, so I got another pair. I wear 10.5 so I got a 11 fits bear foot, if you use socks you would want to go a size up 12. (pricey but well made, made in china now) You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Miles R

customer_reviews.title: If they feel too small, give it time
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought for sure they were too small, but my wife insisted I give it a few days. After about three days of wearing them, they stretched and now fit perfectly. I wear a size 11 shoe and ordered an 11 slipper. They seem good quality, and they're very comfortable. Uggs has a suede cleaning kit, which I recommend for cleaning these. Best pair of slippers I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: They are fake UGGs. Do not buy them unless you want to pay real UGG prices for a fake product. The wool on the inner part of the shoe started to flake off with just wearing them for 5 minutes. I realized they seemed stiffer and much less comfortable than any other pair of UGGs I’ve ever had, so I took a look and there is many signs of the shoe not matching up to UGG standards
customer_reviews.author: connor

customer_reviews.title: The slipper I’ve been looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar pair to these Uggs years ago and have been searching for a similar pair since they fell apart. After trying a few no-name brands, I’m so glad I went with the Uggs. They are perfect. Like other reviews stated, they are not slide in/out, but more of a house slipper.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Too Tight, Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: I’m a size 9 in woman’s and I got a size 7 in mens and it’s too snug, I wanted this color for awhile but I didn’t realize they only had it for Men, so I decided to get it and it’s too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Benitez

customer_reviews.title: Love em.
customer_reviews.text: Love these slippers. When I first tried them on they fit very tightly and I thought about returning them however I decided to break them in a little. I am glad I did. They fit nicely now. I wear a size 10.5 to 11. I ordered the 11.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hoover

customer_reviews.title: Allow 3 days to adjust to your actual foot size.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews that it would stretch out in time and must admit I was concerned as my feet are "Flintstone feet" very wide. Initially they were snug, but within 3 days of wearing they fit perfectly. They are not so overly stuffed with fuzzy wool that cause your feet to sweat. Indoor/Outdoor nice morning slipper well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: triple dipper

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & Warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size smaller than I normally would. They were originally a bit tight, but the slipper stretches overtime. These are my favorite slippers and they are very comfy and warm.
customer_reviews.author: IAM Hall

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old loves these. He wears a 6 1/2 in big kids...was afraid to order boys sz 6. Ordered the 7 and its roomy but still fits!! He loves them and says without socks his feet are toasty!! Looks very nice on him! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: misschristmastree

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit
customer_reviews.text: Materials and construction are good but as a slipper they are a total fail. Runs really small. Almost impossible to put on because of zero flex in the foot opening. Don't stay on your feet (after two steps I was walking on the back of the slipper). They're going back.
customer_reviews.author: egeek

customer_reviews.title: Best I've Had
customer_reviews.text: I am a large person and go through slippers pretty fast. I tried these slippers at my wife's request and I'm glad I did. They are the best fitting with the most support I've ever had in a slipper. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes , Runs small
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved these shoes, He usually wears a size 7.5 men. We ordered these in a size 8 men and they were too small. Same for myself in women’s. The cut is small so order a size up for a more comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Belindra Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Or too small they don’t have any arch support, they just keep you warm
customer_reviews.text: Or too small they don’t have any arch support, they just keep you warm
customer_reviews.author: J Chester

customer_reviews.title: Well made slipper
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! The low back heel allows for good air circulation all . I ordered size 12, which is a size larger than I normally wear to accommodate my wide foot. Fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Alice & Stan

customer_reviews.title: You can never go wrong with a handsome pair of Uggs
customer_reviews.text: You can never go wrong with a handsome pair of Uggs. Brought these for my son for Christmas and he loves the ease of just being able to slip into them. In addition to the warmth and comfort. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Acegirl676

customer_reviews.title: Great slipper
customer_reviews.text: My second pair. First one lasted around 3 years. I am retired so I probably wear them more than most. They do keep your feet warm and are made so you can run out to a store quick without worrying about them. My only complaint is that when the fur wore out the material underneath is hard as a rock so the shoe / slipper needs replacing. They should have a soft material below the fur.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. O'hagan

customer_reviews.title: UGG Tasman Mens Slippers a Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: Love these warm and comfortable UGG Tasman Mens Slippers. Have tried other styles and makes, found them uncomfortable and the rubber soles to leave stains & streaks. But these UGG Tasman slippers are comfortable, fit well and the rubber soles do not leave stains. Feel great wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: EarthPlanner

customer_reviews.title: Men’s style hugs women’s bunions
customer_reviews.text: Wear women’s 8.5 wide....but after struggling to fit my bunions into something comfy, this men’s 7 is the perfect answer. Very roomy in a good way with a warm grey color hue that simply looks classic. Searched for a slipper that would not be seamed near my bunions and this style exceeded my requirements. After all, an UGG rarely disappoints.
customer_reviews.author: OnceCAdreamin'nowCAlovin'

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I wear 11.5-12. Bought a 12, too small. Bought a 13, too small. Bought a 14, too big and hurt my feet. I’ll stick to the slip on Ugg, that I have always loved, just worn out due to covid and working from home and in slippers 24/7.
customer_reviews.author: B. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable once you get the correct size.
customer_reviews.text: I had to exchange for the next full size. I have always wanted to try this brand, other than having to mess with the return, I love this slipper. I will buy more of them, and recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: J.B. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Slippers!
customer_reviews.text: My husband wore out his previous pair after 8 years and needed a replacement. These are beautiful and high quality/well made slippers. They do fit snugly at first because of the new fluffy lambswool inside, but after wearing they break in after a week (same as the other review said). Recommend ordering 1/2 size bigger, even though they come in whole sizes. My husband wears a 12 1/2 so the 13 is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: PHd

customer_reviews.title: Company shipped product 7 sizes too small.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a USA Mens size 15 M. What I got was a USA Mens size 8. Nice looking slippers, but hardly fits on my foot. Doubt I'll reorder from this vendor
customer_reviews.author: S. Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Happy son.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 14 year old son. He said they were tight at first, about 2 days later they were perfect. He said he likes them and they keep his feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: MD2614

customer_reviews.title: Second pair
customer_reviews.text: Our son wore out his first pair after several years so purchased this pair for him for Christmas. His wife is happy they are already "dirt color". Ha-ha. He loves his so much that I purchased the women's version for me. Now I'm in love with my UGG slippers too. These are the real thing, not knock-offs and you pay for what you get. If this is your first pair of UGGS, be prepared for them to feel slightly snug at first. This is a good thing because the fluffy interior will compact some with wear and then they will fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: C. Shores

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a little big
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend and I have the same ones. The shoes are super comfortable and I like the look. They are a little big just overall and it’s easy to trip, but still worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelynn

customer_reviews.title: The best for 2018-2019
customer_reviews.text: Three family members have purchased these shoes, and all of us, are impressed with the comfort, durability, and vast color assortment. Great purchase both personally, and as a gift. Thanks,
customer_reviews.author: Phil E. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but all wrong
customer_reviews.text: The sizes are truly small.... at least 2 whole sizes... it is stiff like a rock
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy comfy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my fiancé for Father’s Day. He was so excited and loves them, says there so comfy and a nice walk around the home. I’ve snuck and put them on and so worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Taylor

customer_reviews.title: My 1st pair of UGGs
customer_reviews.text: I've read reviews and decided to buy a one size larger than actual and it fit as expected. Bought another pair later , just to keep for spare in case
customer_reviews.author: Alex Murashov

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but I found it tight in the toes
customer_reviews.text: I relly like these shoes, but as mentioned above, I found it tight in the toes. I hope there will be a little give with use. Excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: Harold K.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: UGGS come in whole sizes only. I wear a 10 1/2 but bought the 10. After wearing them for a week they fit perfectly. The leather moves to form to your foot and the wool breaks down inside the slipper to form to your foot. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: G. Robert Cowles

customer_reviews.title: Not designed for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality and functional slipper, however, if you have a wide foot, even moderately wide, the foot opening will be tight. I’m my case, it would take a shoe horn to get the slipper on... which defeats the purpose of a slipper. Unfortunately returning.
customer_reviews.author: Nick M. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Hubby's favorite brand of slipper.
customer_reviews.text: Hubby's last pair finally gave up, lasted years, so worth the price. Comfy and warm, thick soled. So glad I found them, hubby is so happy. Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Lady A

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fit really well and comfortable. I have purchased same slipper and lastly for years so decided to buy again. Look great and obviously durable so I recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Tessie

customer_reviews.title: cozy and warm
customer_reviews.text: I would suggest buying one size larger. I am usually 12.5, and 13 for this pair is still a little tight. But other than that, as expected, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Yu Wu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love them! I got a pair for someone as a gift and they wear them all the time! Don’t be nervous that instore uggs will fit better than online ones because they are exactly the same. Would definitely buy these again. True to size
customer_reviews.author: Emilie Sabura

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These slippers look much more comfortable in the pictures than reality. For this price they should fit well and be extremely comfortable out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: The Most Comfortable Slipper
customer_reviews.text: The fit is a little tighter around the arch of the shoe, but all-in-all one of the most comfortable slippers I’ve ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: Order a size larger than you normally do.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. They do run a full size small. I wear a size 16. I was really happy that I got the size 17. They feel great. If you have arch support issues, well you may have some problems.
customer_reviews.author: G. Worsham

customer_reviews.title: One of the best styles of Uggs
customer_reviews.text: I own a bunch of these. I’m a 9 in women’s and a 8 in men’s. I love this color! I usually get the light brown color but figured I’d switch it up. I’ve been wearing Tasman slippers for over 10 years now and they usually last me 5-6 years each. Yes they’re pricey but the quality is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Todd

customer_reviews.title: Authentic! Gorgeous Uggs!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Uggs came wrapped nicely in great condition. Arrived promptly. My son loved them! And they are real which I was worried about ! Beware of fake Uggs.
customer_reviews.author: TjWow!

customer_reviews.title: UGGS best shoes I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoe just a couple things I would change. And they are minor so it doesnt matter what they do, just my suggestion to make it more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Derp McDerpy

customer_reviews.title: warm (not hot) and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: one of the best slippers/house shoes i have purchased very warm (not hot) and comfortable, would like the rear upper to be a bit taller so it doesn't feel like it will slip off. It hasn't yet as it holds very well ,I wouldn't sprint for even short distances though. .
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my hubby's bday and hasn't taken them off yet. He loves the fit (be sure to go a whole size larger) and just how warm they are! Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: CassieCeeCee

customer_reviews.title: Great Slippers
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my husband for Christmas. He’s hard on slippers and walks outside in them. These are perfect for him. Keep his feet warm and the soles hold up to his abuse
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Mac slippers
customer_reviews.text: Worn around my house, all seasons. 3rd pair in about 15 years. Very durable, top quality. I may even be burried in them.
customer_reviews.author: PJM

customer_reviews.title: It worth what you paid
customer_reviews.text: They are perfect, as the interior is so fluffy I buy half number more, for sleepers 1 more. It fits perfect and they are a high quality. My husband love them. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: lucy navarro

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I had reconstructive foot surgery on my left foot and I have been looking for something comfortable to wear around the house and I think I found what I was looking for they are sooooooooo comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rasalic Mackey

customer_reviews.title: Needed to compromise. Great Slippers
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Warm. Needed a large toe box, so had to go a bit large. Superior product. Hammer toes and swelling and feet asymmetrical make finding a decent fit very difficult. Very happy to find these.
customer_reviews.author: Dangerous Dave

customer_reviews.title: Watch the size.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 12 in a shoe, I ordered a 13 because they are slippers. The length is just right but they are a little big in the width. They are comfortable and they are warm but not too warm as I have found with some other slippers. Overall I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Spiney Norman

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: I got them for my husband for Christmas. He loves them. Just wishes that the lip in the back was stiff so it won’t eventually break down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Run small!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a size 10 (his standard shoe size) for my husband and he could not get his foot in it. They had to go back. Definitely order 1 or 2 sizes up!
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: European size is 42. Lighter brown than expected
customer_reviews.text: European sizing is 42 regardless if it’s men’s vs women’s sizing. Made in Vietnam. Lighter brown than actually pictured
customer_reviews.author: jlk

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: My husband has high arches & thick feet. He could barely get his foot in this slipper. I even ordered a size larger, but the opening was just too small
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift, Great look
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are slightly larger than expected. I ordered a size 11, which my son’s actual sneaker & snow size but I could have ordered a half size smaller. Other than that it’s perfect and I would recommend it to friends & family.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for a friend who had really been wanting some. He said that they are soo comfortable and his go to slipper. He will only wear UGGs because of the quality and perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Melody V.

customer_reviews.title: Slippers
customer_reviews.text: I got them for my husband for Christmas. He loves them. A little snug but I’m sure they will form to his feet after a few wears
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Burke

customer_reviews.title: Incoorect Sizing, mediocre quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a size 10 US and my 9.5 feet were not able to fit. I recommend getting at least a full size up from what you normally wear in order for these to fit. From a construction quality, these are not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: MGZ4

product_meta.description: Lined with premium sheepskin, the tasmania functions both indoors as a slipper or outdoors as a shoe.
